name: Spark Cursor
description: A dazzling spark cursor effect that sparks on the user's mouse onClick, adding a magical touch to any webpage.

usageExamples.title: Basic Usage
usageExamples.description: Wrap any content to add click spark effects
usageExamples.code: Click anywhere in this area

usageExamples.title: Custom Spark Color
usageExamples.description: Customize the spark color and size
usageExamples.code:
<SparkCursor sparkColor="#ff6b6b" sparkSize={15}>
  <button className="px-6 py-3 bg-red-500 text-white rounded-lg">
    Click for Red Sparks
  </button>
</SparkCursor>
